segments.text: Do you have any job placement services at EDD ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The first thing that you should check out is callous , which is a great Internet-based placement service that you can use .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about people who don â€™ t have a computer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can search for jobs on the computers at the EDD offices .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What else is there at the EDD offices that can help me with my job search ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can help you find local information about available jobs and workshops .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are the different workshops that are available at the EDD offices ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Resume Writing and Interviewing are our two most popular workshops .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you think of some other places where I may look for work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Many times there are special services available to certain groups like Women at Work or job help for non-English speakers .
segments.speaker: S2
